name: Higurashi When They Cry: Chapter 3 - Tatarigoroshi
name_original: Higurashi When They Cry: Chapter 3 - Tatarigoroshi
description:
Higurashi When They Cry: Chapter 3 - Tatarigoroshi is an adventure game developed by 07th Expansion. It came out on 24-06-2016. It was published by MangaGamer. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Higurashi When They Cry: Chapter 3 - Tatarigoroshi is available on PC and Classic Macintosh.
